SELECT pr.*, FALSE AS check_flag, p. NAME AS p_name, p. CODE AS p_code, p. LEVEL AS p_level, p.type AS p_type FROM t_permission_relation pr inner JOIN t_permission p ON p.id = pr.permission_id WHERE data_state = 1 AND pr.id NOT IN ( SELECT permission_relation_id FROM t_user_permission WHERE user_id = #{userId} and data_state = 1 ) UNION SELECT pr.*, TRUE AS check_flag, p. NAME AS p_name, p. CODE AS p_code, p. LEVEL AS p_level, p.type AS p_type FROM t_permission_relation pr inner JOIN t_permission p ON p.id = pr.permission_id inner join t_user_permission up on up.permission_relation_id = pr.id WHERE pr.data_state = 1
